text: The women's slalom C-1 (canoe single) competition at the 2018 Asian Games was held from 21 to 23 August 2018. Each NOC could enter two athletes but only one of them could advance to the final. ==Schedule== All times are Western Indonesia Time (UTC+07:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" !
